title: tier red velvet cake
description: We show you how to make a wedding cake or celebration cake with our simple but impressive recipe.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a 15cm/6in, 23cm/9in and 30cm/12in round cake tin and cake board. You will also need eight dowelling rods (available from specialist cake shops)
ingredients: 150g/5oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
350g/12oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
650g/1lb 7oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
